text: Yesterday, I had the privilege of visiting @GEHealthcare in Wisconsin to see American industry and American workers at their very best. Under President @realDonaldTrump’s leadership and because of the hard work of the American people, we will have 110,000 ventilators in 100 days. https://t.co/JyIAGEnq7t
